Nimoars blazing bulwark was a magical shield employed by the famed Nimoar the Reaver, War Lord of Waterdeep.
The bulwark was a heavy steel shield fitted with spikes. The shield weighed about  and would sell for around 12,480 gold pieces in most markets of Faer√ªn.
The shield itself was enchanted to act as a bashing shield, while the attached spikes were enchanted to act as a flaming weapon.
This weaponized shield was carried into battle by Nimoar the Reaver during the First Trollwar of the , where it served well against the regenerating giants.
After Nimoars death, the blazing bulwark came to the Waterdhavian family of Silmerhelve, where it was passed down for generations. When heir Laerlos Silmerhelve II left Waterdeep and his family to join the Midnight Men mercenary group, he took the shiled with him. Laerlos fell in the Battle of Turnstone Pass in the , and the shield was buried alongside his body in the Cairn of Moonlight.
